recipesJson.name: SLIT'S CREAMY MELON BALLS
recipesJson.author: SLIT
recipesJson.description: Perfectly sweetened honeydew with watermelon undertones in a refreshing fluffy, light, clean, sweet cream. Good full mouth feel with zero peppery taste or harshness. No strawberry flavor in the vape. It's just in there for a bit of sweetness, as opposed to using sweetner. Great as a shake & vape, but matures extremely well after a month of steeping. This will be your ADV no matter what the season.
